name: A Book Hunt
description:
Your lover is sick inside your bedroom. And unbelievably bored! What’s their favorite thing in the world? Books!

You go on an adventure through the house to find options for them to read!

Seven different endings! (Plus a secret ending…)

This is my first game. If you find any bugs, glitches, or misspellings, please inform me!

Thanks for playing, I appreciate it. I might make more text based in the future.
